alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 8:54PM CST until March 21 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Concordia and Adams Counties. For the Lower Mississippi River ...including Arkansas City, Greenville, Vicksburg, Natchez...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY, MARCH 16 TO TUESDAY, MARCH 21... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From Thursday, March 16 to Tuesday, March 21. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 43.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday, March 17 to a crest of 48.5 feet Monday, March 20. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 43.3 Sun 8 pm CST 43.5 44.1 44.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 900 AM CST.
